text: “Ndithudi, amene akubisa zomwe Allah adavumbulutsa m’buku (la Baibulo) m’malo mwake nasankha zinthu zamtengo wochepa, iwo sadya china mmimba mwawo koma moto basi; ndipo Allah sadzawayankhula tsiku lachimaliziro (mwachifundo koma mokwiya); ndipo sadzawayeretsa. Ndipo iwo adzapeza chilango chopweteka
